text: Gagan bhaiya Ather sirf ek kaam mai acha hai aur wo hai customers ki pareshaani chupaane mai. UP jaisi jagah mai unka app connectivity nahi kaam karti, scooter ke UI mai bhar bhar ke glitches hai, scooter beech raste mai chalna bund kar deti hai and battery problems bhi bhot saari hai. Aur in sab issue ke top pe agar batau to Ather warranty deta hai aur us per kaam karte hai ye log but itna zada time lagate hai warranty claim karne mai ki uski bhi hud nahi. Ye sab baate aap ko nahi pata hongi because ather baate chupaata bhot ache se hai.
